title: ADOBE InDesign Hyphenation - Armenian
content:
I need to implement H&J for Armenian in InDesign. I own  
CS2 myself, but if we'd need a newer version no problem.

Has this already been done perhaps? We have somebody  
who knows all the hyphenation rules, but how does one  
go about writing such a plug-in?

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
As of CS3, InDesign doesn't have native support for Armenian hyphenation.

There's documentation at [http://www.adobe.com/devnet/linguisticlibrary/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110429073221/http:/www.adobe.com/devnet/linguisticlibrary/ "http://www.adobe.com/devnet/linguisticlibrary/") if you want to develop a plug-in.

Miguel, I should have just asked you directly!  
I will look at that link, thank you.

BTW, does anybody know how the situation would be with Quark?

hhp
